title: shAradAmbA
sahitya:
shAradAmbA sharaNam Om hrIm sakala vidyA vinOdini sAdhu sanga sahAyini


anupallavi

  nArAyaNI jnAnavANI nAdabindu svarUpiNi nAnAvidha kalAbhUSaNi naLina hrdaya nivAsini


caraNam    paripUrNa yOgEshvari bhakta sanga paramEshvari varadAyaki jaya bhArati
vAgIshvari bhAgyalakSmI manasvati dhanasvati jayasvati sarasvati
